strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Retro RPG Update' metaphor transforms dry technical changes (API paths, model versions) into exciting 'gameplay improvements'. The pixel art style aligns perfectly with indie-dev nostalgia and the 'cozy garden' brand identity, making the tech feel approachable and warm.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art title screen scene. A tiny 8-bit bee character holding a glowing lime green (#ecf874) wrench and a magic wand, standing in front of a pixelated garden gate. Soft pastel sunset gradient background (lavender to peach). Chunky retro pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'UPDATE LOG'. Wholesome and inviting.
images.description: Title card establishing the cozy maintenance/upgrade theme.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art showing a 'New Item Acquired' screen. A large, majestic pixelated sunflower glowing with magical energy, representing 'gptimage-large'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) sparkles around it. Dark purple background with UI box borders. RPG inventory aesthetic. Text: 'GPT IMAGE 1.5'. Nostalgic gaming vibes.
images.description: Highlighting the new large image model as a 'rare item' drop.

images.prompt: Pixel art infographic split screen. Left side: A cute pixel robot (DeepSeek) leveling up, with an 'UPGRADE' arrow pointing up. Right side: An intricate system of pixelated pipes and nodes watering flowers (n8n-grok). Soft pastel colors, lime green (#ecf874) accents. Isometric view like the game Unpacking. Clean, cozy, detailed.
images.description: Visualizing the DeepSeek upgrade and the new node-based n8n tool.

images.prompt: A peaceful pixel art scene of a bee mechanic fixing a wooden path in a forest. Representing 'fixing mangled endpoints'. The path goes from jagged to smooth. Soft dappled sunlight through pixel trees. Lime green (#ecf874) tools. Warm, relaxing atmosphere like Stardew Valley. Text: 'SMOOTHER PATHS'.
images.description: Metaphor for the API endpoint fixes - making the developer journey smoother.

caption:
